name: Crossing Paths
description:
SAMURAI, you must eliminate a TOP GOVERNMENT OFFICIAL whose actions are leading to EMINENT WAR!  Only you have the means to reach your target.

BUT BEWARE!!!

Enemies have sent an ARMY OF ASSASSINS to stop you.  Hidden among the crowd, your sharp eye and the GLINT OF THEIR STEEL will tell you who is friend or foe!

Made in 72 hrs for the Ben Bonk Game Jam
